body_html: Thanks for the report, we'll look into that. I'd only suggest switching to a different backend (e.g. gloo or MPI), because TCP is really nearly a debug-mode thing and will likely not get anywhere close to peak performance.
body_text: Thanks for the report, we'll look into that. I'd only suggest switching to a different backend (e.g. gloo or MPI), because TCP is really nearly a debug-mode thing and will likely not get anywhere close to peak performance.
body: Thanks for the report, we'll look into that. I'd only suggest switching to a different backend (e.g. gloo or MPI), because TCP is really nearly a debug-mode thing and will likely not get anywhere close to peak performance.
